apiKey.description: API key used by the cfollow client, returned by the server

customDatabaseQuery.description: Execute a custom SQL query. The server must make sure the query is safe to use

silent.description: If true, no response will be returned by the cfollow client but configuration changes and SQL requests will be performed. Default is false

serverTime.description: ISO-8601 date as configured on the server. The client will override its time to this

connectionsRequest.description: An object to configure what the client needs to supply in terms of connections

count.description: Number of records to return. If missing, no connections will be given in client response but proposed configuration will be applied

defaultCount.description: Number of records to return by default in initiating request

index.description: Starting index for the response to this message. Will start from 0 if empty

newOnly.description: Whether to only return new (not-snchonized) records. Defaults to false

reconnectIntervalMinutes.description: Set the interval at which a connection should be reattempted

count.description: Number of records to return. If missing, no positions will be given in client response but proposed configuration will be applied

gpsLocationMinutes.description: Set the interval at which a GPS coordinates should be registered

gpsModuleStop.description: If true stops the GPS module until sent as false

index.description: Starting index for the response to this message. Will start from 0 if empty

newOnly.description: Whether to only return new (not-snchonized) records. Defaults to false
